job_description:
• Coordinate the business processes and QMS components, ensuring efficiency, adherence to requirements, and successful delivery of intended outputs.
• Maintain the integrity of the QMS/business process during planned changes, ensuring customer requirements are met.
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present data in large meetings.
• Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field, or equivalent experience.
• Desired: 1 year of semiconductor experience.
• Strong data analysis and computer skills.
• Demonstrated proficiency in coordinating and prioritizing multiple tasks effectively.
• Proven ability to coordinate efforts across various groups.
